comments: chapter reading quizzes every week. need & read your textbook. exams are tricky & no one ever does well (class avg is between 70-80). doesnt really offer extra credit. one 8 page TEAM essay. lots of assignments. not an easy A. have to do your assignment

Attendance technically isn\'t mandatory, but there are days where participation points are awarded (just be there). Study the powerpoints for the tests. Ask if you need help with anything. Great teacher!

Took online. Teacher was amazing!! Works with you outside of class and tries his best to help you understand. Very smart. He also allows you to rework your milestones of you rproject (for averaged credit). The project is the main part of your grade and is hard but doable. This teacher is a must for CIS majors. I hope GSU picks this guy up full time

GREAT TEACHER!!!This instructor really makes you understand the material. Allows redos on milestones for averaged credit. Large group project which is a large part of your grade. Really cool guy and he will work with you outside of class. He didn\'t win a teaching award for nothing. :-). A must take for cis majors.

no study guide for test. all-short answer test (takes so much time). i prefer a mixture of multiple choice, true/false and short answer questions. he is a good teacher but you have to prepare your own review for test. he\'s good at teaching but testing is not that practical. test is hard.
